newsitem.title: GERMANY: West German March Ifo index minus 10.2 on balance.
newsitem.headline: West German March Ifo index minus 10.2 on balance.

text.p: The German Ifo economics institute gave the following data from its February business climate survey:
W. Germany- monthly change March 1997 Feb 1997

NOTE - IFO last month started releasing data on a balanced basis, which the institute believes better reflects business confidence after unification. The figures reflect a change from month-ago numbers rather than giving an index value compared with the base year of 1991. East and west index figures had drifted apart after the eastern post-unification upswing and the western states' recession. Figures could range between extremes of plus and minus 100 points. A positive figure represents an improvement from the previous month, a negative figure represents a deterioration. The final figure is calculated by balancing out positive and negative comments from firms, ignoring the neutral assessments.
